name: Race Drivin'
description: Race Drivin' is an updated remake of the 1990 coin-op racing game of the same title. It features the original Hard Drivin' course, the courses added in the original Race Drivin', and three brand new courses only found in this new version. The number of available vehicles has also increased from 3 to 8. The game includes both a single-player championship mode and an arcade time attack mode.
